item.title: A Moment in Crime Special Report: "The Junkers" | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b'Their spree of mayhem and chaos has caused untold millions in property damage around the world. But who are these two deranged Junkers, and what is behind their destructive rampage? Find out in this special episode of A Moment in Crime! 

If you have any information on the whereabouts of these dangerous criminals, please contact us at tips@amomentincrime.com. 

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

b"It's a perfect day for some mayhem: http://blizz.ly/MeetJunkrat 

Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed freak who lives to cause chaos and destruction. A former member of a group of anarchistic scavengers known as the Junkers, he's now embarked upon an international crime spree with Roadhog, leaving nothing but havoc and bedlam in his wake.

Junkrat excels at area denial. His arsenal includes a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks. But his favorite toy is the RIP-Tire, a rolling bomb that drives across the battlefield, destroying everything around it when it explodes.

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch"

Approaching Nirvana on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/approaching-nirvana/id313583565
__

Thanks for watching! #Overwatch'

b"Junkrat especially in matchmaking gets silly amounts of value. All the dominant playstyles Junkrat can counter, as long as the map isn't too unfavorable to him. Everything? Yes, everything! He can whittle down tanks and static bunker comps, control against dive with big burst to protect your backline. His ult wins fights and his mobility controls the space and positioning he desperately needs. At least with how the meta is working right now, Junkrat is the type of hero McCree could only dream of being, mainly because he has the mutli use tool of his mine that keeps him out of harms way as well as having a potential insta-kill if someone dares get to close. One may think Junkrat is an easy hero and he is in the grand scheme of things, but once you can burst down squishy healers and static dps, challenge flankers and get a high % of shots on tanks, you'll be well on your way to controlling the entire battlefield. If you enjoyed the video, be sure to leave it a like! 

Subscribe here - http://bit.ly/2aN1OuO
